LanguageData.Module_LargeBattery.label: heavy duty battery
LanguageData.Module_LargeBattery.description: This module triples the mechframe's internal battery capacity.
LanguageData.Module_Supply.label: field supply module
LanguageData.Module_Supply.description: This module consumes field supply ration to replenish pilot's food and rest needs in action. Does not fully replace actual bed rests as side effects may follow.
LanguageData.Module_SolarPower.label: solar panel module
LanguageData.Module_SolarPower.description: An array of photoelectric cells charges the mechframe using solar power when inactive.
LanguageData.Module_ComfortAndJoy.label: combat recreation module
LanguageData.Module_ComfortAndJoy.description: Armed with softened sofa and on-board recreation system, this module provides a comfortable cockpit enviroment and electronic entertainments, a luxury in battlefields.
